sentences.en: By now he was quite aware as to whence this powerful uprising had sprung.
sentences.cn: 现在他很清楚,这种强有力的骚动是从哪里来的.

sentences.en: He saw vaguely the ship he have deserted uprising before him.
sentences.cn: 他隐约看见他所丢弃的船在他面前升了起来.

sentences.en: In 1282 a popular uprising known as the Sicilian Vespers ended the subsequent French rule.
sentences.cn: 1860年义大利爱国人士加里波底解放该城,使其成为义大利王国的一部分.

sentences.en: In order to obtain Agape, we must go on a mystic uprising road.
sentences.cn: 要想达到真正的神圣之爱必须要经过一条神秘的上升之路.

sentences.en: It'started on August 1, 1944 , as part of a nationwide uprising, Operation Tempest.
sentences.cn: 这场战役是在 1944年 8月1日开始的.

sentences.en: Manipulator double uprising system can enlarge photos with  the higher speed at 1100 per hour.
sentences.cn: 机械手式的双轨提升设计,实现高速扩印,每小时出片可达1100张!

sentences.en: Meanwhile, the uprising in Punjab has proceeded unabated.
sentences.cn: 与此同时, 旁遮普省的骚乱有增无减.

sentences.en: People cannot bear his cruel government, so they united to prepare for uprising stealthily.
sentences.cn: 在当时的高压统治之下,人民之间相互取得联络是比较困难的.

sentences.en: The crustal movement in Three Gorges Reservoir Area has been intermittent uprising movement since Cenozoic era.
sentences.cn: 新生代以来,三峡库区地壳运动主要表现为间歇性隆起.

sentences.en: The uprising or downfalling of an enterprise lies in its management or administration.
sentences.cn: 企业兴衰主要在经营管理.

sentences.en: Thou knowest my downsitting and mine uprising , thou understandest my thought afar off.
sentences.cn: 2我坐下,我起来, 你都晓得.你从远处知道我的意念.

sentences.en: With the uprising of anti - essentialism, the illegitimacy of gender ontology is commonly questioned.
sentences.cn: 摘要当代 反 本质主义思潮兴起, 性别本体论的合法性受到普遍质疑.

trans.tran_en: an attempt by a group of people to change the government, laws etc in an area or country
